text: Horseshoe Lake is a lake in Mono County, California, near the Mammoth Mountain ski resort. The soil near the lake contains a high concentration of carbon dioxide which, when it seeps from the soil, kills trees and poses a threat to humans. Aerial image of Horseshoe Lake, showing areas with high carbon dioxide concentrations ==References== Category:Lakes of Mono County, California
title: Horseshoe Lake (Mono County, California)
